info.name: Force DejaVu Sans YuanTi Fonts
info.description:
Force to use DejaVu Sans YuanTi Fonts for better Chinese-English display effects.


对所有网页强制使用DejaVu Sans YuanTi字体以获得更佳的中英混排效果.
info.additionalInfo:
Please install DejaVu Sans YuanTi first!
For archlinux:
sudo yaourt -S ttf-dejavusans-yuanti


使用该脚本前请先安装DejaVu Sans YuanTi!
在archlinux下安装:
sudo yaourt -S ttf-dejavusans-yuanti
